cinnamon.engine.utils

Class Bounds

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.utils.Bounds
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Position, Size
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutableBounds, SphereBounds

    public abstract class Bounds
extends Object
implements Position, Size

    Defines a 3D shape with methods for testing containment and intersection against other Bounds or the spherical variant SphereBounds. The default implementations for containment and intersection tests operate on the Bounds as an axis-aligned box. Subclasses representing a different shape should provide their own implementations for the following methods.

    • float getVolume()
    • float getSurfaceArea()
    • boolean contains(Bounds)
    • boolean contains(SphereBounds)
    • boolean contains(Point)
    • boolean intersects(Bounds)
    • boolean intersects(SphereBounds)

    Implicit box

    No matter the shape, a Bounds maintains an implicit minimal axis-aligned box defined by two points: minimum and maximum. Each point represents a corner of the shape's tight-fitting box, forming a diagonal that cuts across the volume in three dimensions. It should be noted that it is possible for either or both minimum and maximum points to fall outside the shape but not the implicit box (e.g. in the case of a sphere).

    Specificity

    Care should be taken when testing a Bounds for containment or intersection since a Bounds of another shape, such as SphereBounds, could be treated as a box if passed as an argument of type Bounds, as shown below.

         

         Bounds bounds = new MutableBounds();
         SphereBounds sphere = new MutableSphereBounds();

         // Is sphere inside box
         boolean contained = bounds.contains(sphere);

         // Is box inside box
         Bounds sphereAsBounds = sphere;
         contained = bounds.contains(sphereAsBounds);

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Bounds bounds)

        Checks if a Bounds is contained within. This method tests containment using the given Bounds' implicit box.

        Parameters:
        bounds - bounds.
        Returns:
        true if contained.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if bounds is null.

      • isExclusivelyPartitioned

        public final boolean isExclusivelyPartitioned()

        Checks if a partitioning structure has locked use of the Bounds from other locking partitioning implementations.

        Returns:
        true if in use by a partition that prevents use by other locking partitions.
